1 <?php
2 
3 namespace Ubiquity\cache\traits;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\cache\ClassUtils;
6 use Ubiquity\cache\parser\RestControllerParser;
7 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UArray;
8 use Ubiquity\exceptions\RestException;
9 
19 class RestCacheTrait {
20 
21  private static function initRestCache(&$config, $silent = false) {
22  $restCache = [ ];
23  $files = self::getControllersFiles ( $config );
24  foreach ( $files as $file ) {
25  if (is_file ( $file )) {
26  $controller = ClassUtils::getClassFullNameFromFile ( $file );
27  $parser = new RestControllerParser ();
28  $parser->parse ( $controller, $config );
29  if ($parser->isRest ())
30  $restCache = \array_merge ( $restCache, $parser->asArray () );
31  }
32  }
33  self::$cache->store ( "controllers/rest", "return " . UArray::asPhpArray ( $restCache, "array" ) . ";", 'controllers' );
34  if (! $silent) {
35  echo "Rest cache reset\n";
36  }
37  }
38 
39  public static function getRestRoutes() {
40  $result = [ ];
41  $restCache = self::getRestCache ();
42  foreach ( $restCache as $controllerClass => $restAttributes ) {
43  if (isset ( $restCache [$controllerClass] )) {
44  $result [$controllerClass] = [ "restAttributes" => $restAttributes,"routes" => self::getControllerRoutes ( $controllerClass, true ) ];
45  }
46  }
47  return $result;
48  }
49 
50  public static function getRestCache() {
51  if (self::$cache->exists ( "controllers/rest" ))
52  return self::$cache->fetch ( "controllers/rest" );
53  throw new RestException ( "Rest cache entry `" . self::$cache->getEntryKey ( "controllers/rest" ) . "` is missing.\nTry to Re-init Rest cache." );
54  }
55 
56  public static function getRestResource($controllerClass) {
57  $cacheControllerClass = self::getRestCacheController ( $controllerClass );
58  if (isset ( $cacheControllerClass ))
59  return $cacheControllerClass ["resource"];
60  return null;
61  }
62 
63  public static function getRestCacheController($controllerClass) {
64  $cache = self::getRestCache ();
65  if (isset ( $cache [$controllerClass] )) {
66  return $cache [$controllerClass];
67  }
68  return null;
69  }
70 }
